segments.text: I see the boy reaching into the cookie jar with such determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, but he doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is watching him so intently, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman knows they’re sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing is such a contrast to their focus on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to get caught any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s open palm is so hopeful, it’s sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at their teamwork.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a playful moment frozen in time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could see what happens next.
segments.speaker: PAR
